scripts.start:default: concurrently "npm run services" "wgc router download-binary; cd ./router && ./router"
scripts.start:win32: concurrently "npm run services" "wgc router download-binary && cd router && router.exe"
scripts.start-go:default: concurrently "npm run services-go" "wgc router download-binary; cd ./router && ./router"
scripts.start-go:win32: concurrently "npm run services-go" "wgc router download-binary && cd router && router.exe"
scripts.compose: cd router/ts && wgc router compose -i graphs-ts.yaml -o ../config.json
